page.title: 16HIGH BEECH VILLAGE HALL.
page.content: There is a village hall at High Beech where there are lots of activites. The horticultural society meet once a month at the village hall.They do a show every September and flower arranging and speeches throughout the year.Quite a few old people go who have always lived here.There are motorcycle meetings on monday and tuesday nights.The womens fellowship club has talks,tea,keep-fit and a lot more. People are talking about closing some roads because of the M-25.People notice the motorway more at night as it is noisy. There is a High Beech Cricket Team which is made up mostly from the school children.There is also a High Beech Football Team.
